--- In gladiator@y..., bluedrgnkid@a... wrote:
> Does anyone have one of the 1997 or somewhere around there 
Gladiator? If you 
> run it in windows 3.11 it will glitch and Money will become 
somewhere around 
> -16777215. It gives you infinite cash, giving you a ultimate 
character.

Infinite cash, I don't think so.  By the time you buy a character up 
to experience level 200 you run out of cash.  If that doesn't work, 
just keep spending money on buy higher experience levels.  Either you 
will crash the game for having too much experience for a single 
character or you will run out of money.
